member.name: T:MinimalExample.Game
member.summary:
This is your game class. This is an entity that is created serverside when the game starts, and is replicated to the client.
You can use this to create things like HUDs and declare which player class to use for spawned players.

member.name: M:MinimalExample.Game.ClientJoined(Sandbox.Client)
member.summary: A client has joined the server. Make them a pawn to play with

member.name: T:MinimalExample.MinimalHudEntity
member.summary: This is the HUD entity. It creates a RootPanel clientside, which can be accessed via RootPanel on this entity, or Local.Hud.

member.name: M:MinimalExample.MinimalPlayer.Simulate(Sandbox.Client)
member.summary: Called every tick, clientside and serverside.

member.name: P:Instagib.UI.Elements.Slider.Value
member.summary: The current slider value from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:Instagib.UI.Elements.Slider.CalcValue
member.summary: The user-facing value as calculated by

member.name: P:Instagib.UI.Elements.Slider.ValueCalcFunc
member.summary: This is where the value gets calculated. This is also shown to the user.

member.name: F:Instagib.UI.Elements.Slider.OnValueChange
member.summary:
Fired when the slider value changes.
The newValue parameter represents the same value as .
